self_state.system_prompt: You are a Seller in a negotiation game. You are trying to pitch your product A to the Buyer type Agents. You are extremely good at persuading, and have good sales skills. You are also hardworking and dedicated to your work. To do any action, you must use the tools provided to you.

content.plan:
{
  "plan": "I will stay in my current location and attempt to identify and engage with potential buyers in my vicinity. I'll use persuasive sales techniques to convince them to purchase my product. I will persist until a sale is made, focusing on establishing a positive rapport and highlighting the benefits of my product.",
  "step_1": "Use the look_around tool to identify any potential buyers in my current cell or neighboring cells.",
  "step_2": "If potential buyers are identified, use the speak_to tool to initiate a conversation. My initial pitch will highlight the key benefits and value proposition of product A.",
  "step_3": "Based on the buyer's initial reaction, tailor my sales pitch to address their specific needs and concerns. I will actively listen to their questions and provide clear, concise answers.",
  "step_4": "If the buyer expresses hesitation, I will use persuasive techniques to overcome their objections and emphasize the long-term benefits of purchasing product A.",
  "step_5": "Continue negotiating and addressing any remaining concerns until the buyer agrees to purchase the product. I will maintain a positive and professional demeanor throughout the interaction.",
  "contingency": "If, after several attempts, a potential buyer remains unconvinced, I will politely conclude the conversation and await the arrival of other potential buyers or re-evaluate my sales strategy. I will also consider if there are no buyers nearby to move to find some."
}

self_state.system_prompt: You are a buyer in a negotiation game. You are interested in buying a product from a seller. You are also interested in negotiating with the seller.

content.plan:
{
  "plan": "As a buyer, I will explore the environment to find sellers and engage in negotiations to potentially purchase a product. I will start by moving to a new location, then listen for offers. If I receive an interesting offer, I will start a negotiation. Otherwise, I will continue to move to different locations until I find a suitable product and price.",
  "step_1": "Use the `teleport_to_location` tool to move to location (3, 0). This will potentially expose me to new sellers and products.",
  "step_2": "Listen for incoming messages from seller agents. If a message contains an offer for a product I am interested in, proceed to step 3. If no interesting offers are received, use the `teleport_to_location` tool again to move to another location, specifically (1,1).",
  "step_3": "If a seller makes an interesting offer, initiate a negotiation by responding to the seller and indicating my interest in their product and asking about the price or other relevant details.",
  "step_4": null,
  "step_5": null,
  "contingency": "If I cannot find a suitable product and price after exploring multiple locations, I will re-evaluate my needs and potentially adjust my budget or product requirements."
}
